info.name: ShipEngine Integration Platform Local Dev API

request.description:
Returns the app definition. All references between objects are inlined, so the response is very large.

> **NOTE:** You can use the `Accept-Language` header to test out the app's localization
Connects to an existing account using the data that was gathered in the `connectionForm`.  Returns the updated `transaction` object.
Creates a new shipment, including its labels, tracking numbers, customs forms, etc.
Cancels one or more shipments that were previously created. Depending on the carrier, this may include voiding labels, refunding charges, and/or removing the shipment from the day's manifest.
Calculates the shipping costs for a shipment, or multiple permutations of a shipment
Returns tracking information for a shipment
Schedules a package pickup at a time and place
Cancels one or more previously-requested package pickups
